程序包 us.codecraft.webmagic.selector
的使用

  • 使用us.codecraft.webmagic.selector的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    us.codecraft.webmagic
    Main class "Spider" and models.
    us.codecraft.webmagic.downloader
    Downloader is the part that downloads web pages and store in Page object.
    us.codecraft.webmagic.selector
    Selectors for page extraction.
  • us.codecraft.webmagic使用的us.codecraft.webmagic.selector中的类 
    类和说明
    Html
    Selectable html.
    Json
    parse json
    Selectable
    Selectable text.
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.downloader使用的us.codecraft.webmagic.selector中的类 
    类和说明
    Html
    Selectable html.
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector使用的us.codecraft.webmagic.selector中的类 
    类和说明
    AbstractSelectable 
    AndSelector
    All selectors will be arranged as a pipeline.
    BaseElementSelector 
    CssSelector
    CSS selector.
    ElementSelector
    Selector(extractor) for html elements.
    Html
    Selectable html.
    HtmlNode 
    Json
    parse json
    OrSelector
    All extractors will do extracting separately,
    and the results of extractors will combined as the final result.
    PlainText
    Selectable plain text.
    RegexSelector
    Selector in regex.
    Selectable
    Selectable text.
    Selector
    Selector(extractor) for text.
    SmartContentSelector
    Borrowed from https://code.google.com/p/cx-extractor/
    XpathSelector
    XPath selector based on Xsoup.
